781400.name: Super Steampunk Pinball 2D - Soundtrack
781400.description:
Feast your ears on the soundtrack that started it all! Featuring the inimitable talents of Steve McRae, witness the ultimate in pinball chiptunes that are in games with steampunk aesthetics made by the person writing this paragraph! Seriously though, this is the soundtrack for the game. All proceeds go directly to composer.

Tracks

All tracks are provided in ".mp3" format.

  • 01 - ( 1:36 ) - theme of a pinball game
  • 02 - ( 2:40 ) - a fine day for pinball
  • 03 - ( 2:29 ) - wherein things get serious
  • 04 - ( 0:44 ) - denouement
  • 05 - ( 0:05 ) - better luck next time
  • 06 - ( 1:09 ) - hall of infamy
  • 07 - ( 1:46 ) - triumphancy
  • 08 - ( 1:36 ) - a night at the opera
  • 09 - ( 1:23 ) - duck soup
  • 10 - ( 2:36 ) - bonus track!
